alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Madison, north central Beaverhead and central Gallatin Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northeast of Wisdom to 11 miles southwest of Alder. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief heavy rain showers may also cause minor debris flow in the mountains due to rapid runoff. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Virginia City, Ennis, Twin Bridges, Alder, Silver Star, Melrose, Wise River, Dewey, Laurin, Cameron, Glen and Jeffers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
